attributes.action: Stop the underhanded, stealth tax policies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want Tony Blair to immediately cease any further plans for further taxation. Whether it be extra 'pay as you go' road tax, tax on top of tax on fuel, increases in council tax, etc etc. I, and my family are sick to death of struggling to get by, only to see civil 'servants' wasting our hard earned money. Lets see Tony Blair stripped of everything he owns, and then try to make do on the money we earn. I think he would have a sudden change of heart, when the next stealth tax is suggested. We are at breaking point !!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/HonestTax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
